text: VFW is an initialism for Veterans of Foreign Wars, a U.S. war veterans' organization. VFW may also refer to: *Vancouver Fashion Week, British Columbia, Canada *Vereinigte Flugtechnische Werke, a former German aerospace manufacturer **VFW-Fokker GmbH, a joint venture of Fokker and Vereinigte Flugtechnische Werke *Veterans of Foreign Wars Parkway (VFW Parkway) *Veterans of Future Wars *VFW (film), 2019 film by Joe Begos; see Bliss (2019 film) *VFW Club, a historic building in Hamilton, Montana, list on the U.S. National Register of Historic Places *Video for Windows
title: VFW (disambiguation)
